column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////We had to wait for our seats at the bar but it was worthwhile. The drinks
column2: food and service were excellent. We started with some raw east coast oysters - fresh and clean
column3: and tomato salad with super thick bacon - the most scrumptious bacon we've ever had. For the main course
column4: we shared the 22 oz dry aged rib eye steak with bone marrow and wild mushroom - simply impeccable. Make your reservation early!
